page.title: 17LUDFORD _ ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Two Pubs in village but only one in this Grid area. The Black Horse dates back to 1730 and is a Free House which means is privately owned. Specialises in Barbecued Steaks at weekends and serves bar meals every day & evenings. Is the meeting place of the Wolds Cit_ _izen Band Radio Club and the Lincs. Land Rover Club meets twice a month. A Darts Team & 2 Pool Teams play in local leagues and the Football Club meets here alternately with the White Hart. A Harvest Auction is held to raise money for the Old Folks' Xmas Party and other charities supported. In 1985 got a mention in the Good Beers Guide for its Real Ale. Most houses have TV & an increasing number Video & Music Systems.Theatre _ Lincoln, amateurs at Louth:Concerts at Louth,Lincoln & Grimsby. Jazz at Louth Many local social events in Vill: Hall
